General.Name: Sarana Meditama Metropolitan
General.Description: PT Sarana Meditama Metropolitan Tbk engages in the hospital management of EMC Hospital Pulomas in Pulomas, East Jakarta. The company was founded in 1984 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Sarana Meditama Metropolitan Tbk operates as a subsidiary of PT Elang Mahkota Teknologi Tbk.
General.Address: Jalan Pulomas Barat VI No. 20, Jakarta, Indonesia, 13210

2.Name: Ms. -  Nailufar
2.Title: Head of Sales and Marketing & Director
